summary: Experienced Program and Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the program development at social enterprises. Skilled in Environmental Awareness, Wildlife Conservation, Environmental Policy, Sustainable Development, and Biodiversity. Strong program and project management professional with a Master’s Degree focused in Environmental Science from Wageningen University. I believe in nurturing dialogue and strive to connect individuals and organizations to contribute to environmental and social sound projects.
